newsitem.title: UK: European raw cotton buying interest limited.
newsitem.headline: European raw cotton buying interest limited.

text.p: A sharp advance in New York cotton futures has limited short-term buying interest in European raw cotton, industry sources said.
Many mill buyers have maintained the view that raw cotton prices will weaken as the northern hemisphere new crop harvests gather momentum, they added.

The latest upturn in New York was thought likely to prompt a fresh examination of the price outlook, particularly as many mills are presumed to have purchased significant quantities to meet their shipment requirements over the next few months.
